sections.heading: Repealed.Section 57-12A-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 2003, ch. 167, § 1; repealed by Laws 2003, ch. 167, § 11.

Repeals.— Laws 2003, ch. 167, § 11 repealed 57-12A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2003, ch. 167, § 1, the short title of the Consumer No-Call Act, on July 25, 2003, the date the federal communications commission adopted the delivery restrictions rules, 47 C.F.R. § 64.1200 (2004). For provisions of former section,seethe 2011 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
